alert.note: Alert for Central Columbia River Gorge; Upper Hood River Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 03 at 9:43AM PST until January 04 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches today into tonight. Will be a let up in the snow tonight, but snow may become heavy at times again Tuesday morning. Another 4 to 8 inches of snow are possible at that time. There will be light freezing rain possible as well, with light ice accumulations possible. * WHERE...In Washington, Central Columbia River Gorge. In Oregon, Central Columbia River Gorge and Upper Hood River Valley. * WHEN...Until 6 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult at times.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Central Columbia River Gorge; Upper Hood River Valley
